title: Appearance
custom_preconds: GIVEN the YouTube Game OF the Week Flag is present in the event data
custom_steps: When the user Views the Event Cell
custom_expected:
THEN The MLB.TV icon/copy/link is replaced with YouTube Game of the Week icon/copy/link
AND " [Live on YouTube - Watch Free]" is displayed on a banner beneath the cell

title: YouTube Game of the Week Deeplink ( Youtube application NOT installed )
custom_preconds:
GIVEN YouTube Game of the Week is available
AND the user does NOT have the YouTube application installed.
custom_steps:
WHEN The user selects the YouTube Game of the Week tile
AND selects the YouTube feed
custom_expected: THEN User is redirected to the YouTube App Store page for download

title: YouTube Game of the Week Deeplink ( Youtube application is installed )
custom_preconds:
GIVEN YouTube Game of the Week is available
AND the user does have the YouTube application installed.
custom_steps:
WHEN The user selects the YouTube Game of the Week tile
AND selects the YouTube feed
custom_expected: THEN the User enters YouTube Video

title: YouTube Game of the Week Archived event
custom_preconds: GIVEN the YouTube Game of the Week has entered a Final/ Archived state
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the event tile
custom_expected:
THEN the icon/copy/link will revert back to the original MLB.TV icon/copy/link
AND YouTube Game of the Week will not be referenced
AND normal entitlement rules will apply
